There were no other sightings in Danville on or around February 16th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was at a lumber yard making a delivery {i drive a log truck}waiting for the machine operator to unload my truck when i noticed a unusual sun\cloud mixture when this vehicle came out from behind a cloud. i could not believe what i was seeing. i ran to my truck to get my phone that has a camara. i took 5 pictures in all. it was moving up and down very slowly. it was turning from side to side also very slowly.i remained calm but knew i was seeing something incredible.it left so fast. the blink of an eye. no one else seen it, i know what i seen, now i know there are vehicles from other worlds. i believe........i know........there was a feeling i had while observing that i can't explain. almost like my skin was crawling.
Summary: round bronze colored object, completly silent, dome on top of machine
